### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE waste_management_supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE waste_management_supplies SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE WasteSupplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE
);


CREATE TABLE WasteEquipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    condition VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalSites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);


CREATE TABLE WasteLogistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_vehicle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    driver_name VARCHAR(255),
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);


CREATE TABLE WasteManagementReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE WasteSupplies SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
